Package polyhedra

Interface Polyhedron

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Composite, Cylinder, Sphere
    public interface Polyhedron
extends java.lang.Cloneable
    Polyhedron Interface.

    This should really be split into multiple interfaces using bounded generics.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Polyhedron clone()
      Clone a Polyhedron and minimize casting.
      default Polyhedron cloneAndScale​(double sFactor)
      A helper function to clone and scale a Polyhedron.

      Retrieve the bounding box.
      java.lang.String getType()
      Retrieve the polyhedron name.
      default boolean isComplex()
      Specify whether a Polyhedron is simple or complex (i.e., defined by a combination of sub-polyhedra).

      Specify whether a Polyhedron is simple or complex (i.e., defined by a combination of sub-polyhedra).

      Apply a geometric scaling operation.
      default java.lang.String toStringHelper()
      This is a helper function to generate the String representation of the type and bounding box.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()
        Retrieve the polyhedron name.
        Returns:
        name

      • getBoundingBox

        BoundingBox getBoundingBox()
        Retrieve the bounding box.
        Returns:
        current bounding box

      • scale

        void scale​(double scalingFactor)
        Apply a geometric scaling operation.
        Parameters:
        scalingFactor - scaling factor that is greater than or equal to 1

      • clone

        Polyhedron clone()
        Clone a Polyhedron and minimize casting.
        Returns:
        identical (deep) copy of current polyhedron

      • cloneAndScale

        default Polyhedron cloneAndScale​(double sFactor)
        A helper function to clone and scale a Polyhedron.
        Parameters:
        sFactor - scaling factor
        Returns:
        scaled copy of the original polyhedron

      • toStringHelper

        default java.lang.String toStringHelper()
        This is a helper function to generate the String representation of the type and bounding box.
        Returns:
        type-bounding-box string in the form "[{type:}] -> {boundingBox:}"

      • isComplex

        default boolean isComplex()
        Specify whether a Polyhedron is simple or complex (i.e., defined by a combination of sub-polyhedra).
        Returns:
        true if the polyhedron is complex, and false if the polyhedron is simple.

      • isSimple

        default boolean isSimple()
        Specify whether a Polyhedron is simple or complex (i.e., defined by a combination of sub-polyhedra).
        Returns:
        false if the polyhedron is complex, and true if the polyhedron is simple.
